sqlMap.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, u.login_name AS loginName, u.`status` AS userSatus, u.real_name AS realName, m.card_number AS idCode, CONCAT(b.blacklist,b.qlblackinfo,b.sybadinfo,b.creditCode) AS blackCount FROM t_sys_user u LEFT JOIN t_blacklist_main b ON u.id = b.userId LEFT JOIN t_member_info m ON u.id = m.user_id WHERE u.id = #userId#

SELECT u.id AS userId, u.login_name AS loginName, u.`status` AS userSatus, u.real_name AS realName, m.card_number AS idCode, b.id AS blackCount FROM t_sys_user u LEFT JOIN t_blacklist_main b ON u.id = b.userId LEFT JOIN t_member_info m ON u.id = m.user_id WHERE m.credit_sum > 0 AND b.id is NULL
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO t_blacklist_main ( realName, idcode, userId, loginName, querytime ) VALUES (#realName#, #idCode#, #userId#, #loginName#,NOW());
